member.name: T:Deltares.UGrid.Entities.IoNetCfdImports
member.summary: Class containing all static imports for IONetCdf library
member.remarks: This class contains unused functions and functions that are not documented properly. This is because the native dll will be rewritten to use structures instead of separate function calls to get/set meshes, networks, links etc.

member.name: M:Deltares.UGrid.Entities.IoNetCfdImports.ionc_open_dll(System.String,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Double@)
member.summary: Tries to open a NetCDF file and initialize based on its specified conventions.
member.param: File name for netCDF dataset to be opened.
The io_netcdf dataset id (this is not the NetCDF ncid, which is stored in datasets(ioncid)%ncid.
The detected conventions in the file.

member.summary: Tries to close an open io_netcdf data set.
member.param: The io_netcdf dataset id (this is not the NetCDF ncid, which is stored in datasets(ioncid)%ncid.

member.name: M:Deltares.UGrid.Entities.IoNetCfdImports.ionc_adheresto_conventions_dll(System.Int32@,System.Int32@)

member.param: The NetCDF conventions type to check for.
member.returns: Whether or not the file adheres to the specified conventions.

member.name: M:Deltares.UGrid.Entities.IoNetCfdImports.ionc_clone_mesh_definition_dll(System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Clone the definitions specific mesh from one netCDF file to another netCDF. Clones all related attributes of the mesh, but it can not clone mesh contacts yet!
member.param: The input netCDF file id containing the mesh to clone (in)
The output netCDF file id, can be empty/not empty (in)
The id of the cloned mesh in the output file (out)

member.param: The input netCDF file id containing the mesh to clone (in)
The output netCDF file id, can be empty/not empty (in)
The id of the cloned mesh in the output file (out)

member.name: M:Deltares.UGrid.Entities.IoNetCfdImports.ionc_def_var_dll(System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.Int32@,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32@,System.Double@)
member.summary: Defines a new variable on a 1D network in an IONetCDF data set and sets up proper meta-attributes.
member.remarks: File should still be in define mode. Does not write the actual data yet.
member.param: The network id in the specified data set (in).
The id of the NetCDF variable to define.
The variable type expressed in one of the basic nf90_* types (in). Should match with int fillValueInt (i.e., nf90_integer).
Specifies at which unique mesh location data will be specified (in).
The name of the new variable (in).
Standard name (CF-compliant) for 'standard_name' attribute in this variable (in).
Long name for 'long_name' attribute in this variable (use empty string if not applicable) (in).
Unit of this variable (CF-compliant) (use empty string for dimensionless quantities) (in).

member.name: T:Deltares.UGrid.Helpers.NativeLibrary
member.summary: Helper functions for loading native libraries

member.name: M:Deltares.UGrid.Helpers.NativeLibrary.LoadNativeDll(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Loads the provided native dll ( and ) for the current process.
member.remarks: Call this from a static constructor in a class that has DllImport external methods. This method uses LoadLibrary to load the correct dll for the current process (32bit or 64bit) before DllImport has the chance to resolve the external calls. As long as the dll name is the same this works.
member.param: The directory to load the dll from.
